WHO mobile clinics deployed to Islamic Republic of Iran

9 October 2019, Teheran â The World Health Organization (WHO) has delivered 3 fully equipped mobile clinics to the Ministry of Health and Medical Education of the Islamic Republic of Iran. âThese mobile clinics will provide health services and save lives in communities beyond health centres and health posts both in good times and during the crisis,â said Dr Christoph Hamelamann, WHO Representative in the Islamic Republic of Iran.
